Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent on Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE before Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to be followed by any approval activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR follows
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE after Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time it takes for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to be followed by Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in successful payment processes
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to the next activity in the most frequent variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time it takes Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to be followed by Request Payment in the process flow
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'
